thread.title: Tennessee offers N.C. defensive end/tight end
thread.title_full: Tennessee offers N.C. defensive end/tight end

title: Tennessee offers N.C. defensive end/tight end
text:
Tennessee offers N.C. defensive end/tight end A three-star defensive end/tight end from North Carolina picked up an offer from Tennessee on Wednesday afternoon. Slot to Tennessee Links Three-star defensive end/tight end Andrew Tuazama of Knightdale, N.C. (Photo: Stephen Igoe, 247Sports) 
Three-star junior defensive end/tight end Andrew Tuazama of Knightdale (N.C.) High School posted on his Twitter account Wednesday afternoon that he received a scholarship offer from Tennessee. 
" Blessed to receive an offer from the university of Tennessee #GoVols," he tweeted. (What's next for the Vols? Make sure you're in the loop â€” take five seconds to sign up for our FREE Vols newsletter now!) 
The 6-foot-6, 225-pound Tuazama also holds offers from Miami, Ole Miss, Purdue and East Carolina. 
He's ranked the nation's No. 545 overall prospect and No. 26 weakside defensive end in the 247Sports Composite for the 2018 class. 
Blessed to receive an offer from the university of Tennessee #GoVols pic.twitter.com/OmJzhzr4zf
